name: Simple Battle
description:
A simple multiplayer shooting game. Play with friends or with bots.

Travel to the Grey Planetoids, where mayhem now reigns. Fight a bunch of enemies, aim, shoot, move, push, mine!

Features:
  • Simple concept - Just go, just shoot;
  • Campaign - Complete all levels and defeat the bosses;
  • Multiplayer - Play with friends or with random players;
  • Various game modes with different gameplay;
  • Dynamic battles - you'll be blown away as you plunge into a barrage of projectiles.
